thread.title: Scott Ostler’s deep thoughts, cheap shots and bon mots
thread.title_full: Scott Ostler’s deep thoughts, cheap shots and bon mots - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Scott Ostler
title: Scott Ostler’s deep thoughts, cheap shots and bon mots
text: • James Harden says he was the NBA’s MVP but, “Like I said, I’m not taking anything away from Steph ” Curry . That’s a relief! I was afraid Harden was planning to round up an O.J. Simpson -style posse, bust into Curry’s Orinda home and take the trophy.
